sn1.9:1.2: Standing to one side, a devatā addressed the Blessed One with a verse:
sn1.9:2.1: “Here there’s no taming for one fond of conceit,
sn1.9:2.3: One dwelling alone in the wilderness heedlessly
sn1.9:2.4: won’t cross over beyond Deaths’ realm.”
sn1.9:3.3: one dwelling alone in the wilderness heedfully:
sn1.9:3.4: He will cross over beyond Death’s realm.”
